data.title: Buffistas
data.text:
GF wants me to add a casting option for Yorick, Jensen Ackles (sounds like a disease): [link]

He was the smart ass on Dark Angel.

Also included in the deal will be all-new original graphic novel series for the immensely popular properties The Dark Crystal and Labyrinth.

I'm actually excited about this...but wow, 20 years to continue the properties. Pendulum swinging back to a need for popular fantasy?

Aww, man. I have an alarmingly tacky desire to make a RIP Jim Aparo image using that iconic panel from DitF, but I'll refrain on account of it being alarmingly tacky.
